1: I go to the land shown to me and thrive.
2: I am a blessing to many each day.
3: Blessing others spreads blessing to all families on earth.
4: Follow guidance and begin new journeys at any age.
5: Guide your household to a new land and arrive together.
6: Journey forward with purpose through unfamiliar lands and opportunities
7: Divine promise grants inheritance; gratitude creates enduring dedication.
8: Establish a place of worship and call on the divine.
9: Move steadily toward a clear purpose.
10: Move to a place with abundant resources
11: I acknowledge and honor my spouse's beauty with kindness and respect.
12: Anticipate perceptions and act wisely to safeguard loved ones.
13: Speak kindly to promote wellbeing and preserve life.
14: Recognize and honor genuine beauty in others
15: She is praised before the ruler and welcomed into the palace.
16: Honoring relationships brings abundance and help.
17: Honoring committed relationships brings protection and prosperity to households.
18: Practice honest disclosure of relationships for everyone's wellbeing.
19: Speak truth and honor marriage, preserving peace.
20: People depart safely with family and possessions.
